title: Pixel 2 doesn't support VOLTE and Esim to none of the carrier in India
content: Pixel 2 doesn't support VOLTE and Esim to none of the carrier in India  and when I contact the service provider they tell us we didn't get the support from the Google it's been more than 1 year there is no update for Volte before 1 year I was informed that we will get the Volte and Esim SUPPORT very soon it's been more than 365 days there is no Volte support
